short: If everything in your room is pink, your room is monochromatic ŌĆö all of one color.
long: In physics, monochromatic describes light that has the same wavelength so it is one color. Broken into Greek roots, the word shows its meaning: monos means one, and khroma means color. Things that are truly monochromatic are rare ŌĆö examine the green leaves of trees and you'll see lots of different shades.
